group_1.textLeft: (I, Alina, wish to understand my own theme@in more depth...)
(But I've yet to come up with any answers.@Hence my frustration...)

group_1.textRight: I guess I should give up this time...@I'll let the other teachers know.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, do that.
You'll get nothing more from me no matter how@long you pester me.

group_1.textRight: Then I'll tell you one thing before I go.

group_1.textLeft: Hmm?

group_1.textRight: You're failing world history. You'd better@get ready for some supplementary exams.

group_1.textLeft: Che palle...
You should consider your paneling structure@when you draw.
If you wish to write simple manga then@that's fine.
But if you're trying to emulate your beloved@Magical Kirin...
You should train so that your panels are@more dynamic and action-packed.

group_1.textRight: What?! Huh? Wh-where'd that come from?!

group_1.textLeft: I'm leaving.
Arrivederci.

group_1.textCenter: (All that thinking has put me in quite@a bad mood...)
(What does it mean for me to raise them?@What is the meaning of raising Witches...)
(I, Alina, am an artist...)
(So why am I acting as a breeder?)
Ugh, this is so vile...
So vile! But I am so excited... Why?
Is there a reason why I, Alina, am raising@these Witches?
*Pant* *Pant*
(My theme is "Alina's Beauty".)
(I, Alina, can create whatever I like with my@own senses...)
(So there should be no problem with raising@Witches...)
And yet, ugh, this twisted feeling persists!
Ugh...hhh...
[bgEffect:shakeLarge]RrrrrraaaAAAAAAGH!!!
*Pant* *Wheeze*
I need to uncover it... The meaning behind@my theme...
Until I manage that there is no way I can@proceed as Alina!
Back then it was like a bolt of inspiration@hit me...
So if I go back to the same place...
[chara:100801:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
Oh, the idiota...

group_1.textRight: I didn't think you'd be here for real...
You're giving out the same vibes you did@back when you jumped from the hospital...

group_1.textLeft: I'm not jumping off anything.

group_1.textRight: You're lying! What other reason do you@have to be here?!

group_1.textLeft: It doesn't matter. I can't die.
Nothing... Anyway, I was just hoping to@recapture some old inspiration.
This...? What are you getting at?

group_1.textRight: It's the latest volume of Phantom Thief@Magical Kirin!

group_1.textLeft: I'm aware.

group_1.textRight: Read this and you'll feel better!
You shouldn't just keep worrying about @things.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100801:cheek_0][chara:100801:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:100801:lipSynch_1]*Giggle*
What's your point?
This is just a manga, yet you treat it like@some kind of cure-all.
